Class TeleportCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • jeudeloie.NormalCell
      • jeudeloie.TeleportCell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cell

    public class TeleportCell
extends NormalCell
    TeleportCell is a special cell teleporting to a specified cell.
    Author:
    Theo Plockyn & Remy Debue

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TeleportCell(int idx, int teleIdx)
      Needs its index and the index of the cell where the player will be teleported
